text: It is not according to your fancies, nor according to the fancies of the People of the Book. (No one has a privilege in Godâ€™s sight by virtue of being nominally a Muslim or Jew or Christian. Rather, the truth is this:) Whoever does an evil will be recompensed for it, and he will not find for himself, apart from God, a guardian or a helper (to guard or help him against the consequence of that evil)
